articles.description: Lewis Hamilton lost his grandfather Davidson in 2018 and today said he 'never learnt where my family were from'. Davidson brought the family over from Grenada to Britain in 1955.
articles.content: 1948-70 - Nearly half a million people moved from the Caribbean to Britain, which in 1948 faced severe labour shortages in the wake of the Second World War. The immigrants were later referred to as '… [+11675 chars]

articles.author: Emily Webber
articles.title: Willie Thorne's ex-Miss Great Britain widow and three of his children 'are locked in family feud' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Jill Thorne, 60, from Leicestershire, his second wife and former Miss Great Britain, is set on auctioning the cue for the cancer charity which Willie became a patron of after his brother's death.
articles.content:
Snooker Ace Willie Thorne's widow and his three children are reportedly locked in a family feud over his ashes and favourite cue following his death in Spain.

articles.author: Nigel Owens
articles.title: Nigel Owens column: Why I decided to leave Test stage and the wonderful messages I've since received - Wales Online
articles.description: Hugely popular referee Nigel Owens reflects upon his decision to hang up his whistle at international level
articles.content:
I know it will probably hit me hardest on the first weekend of the Six Nations.
I will wake up and realise its a big round of internationals and I wont be involved.
